fields_of_interest: Environment, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Clinical trial applications for pharmaceuticals, marketing applications for pharmaceuticals, REACH regulation for chemicals, EFSA assessment of food flavours, cosmetics regulation.
membership:
Member of the UK Advisory Committee on Mutagenicity. 
Member of the Steering Committee of the Genetic Toxicology Technical Committee of ILSI/HESI. 
Trustee of the European Environmental Mutagenesis and Genomics Society. 
Former member of the EURL ECVAM Scientific Advisory Committee.
goals__remit: To provide scientific advice to companies, organisations and regulatory agencies on issues related to genotoxicity testing of chemical substances and interpretation of results.
customers: International Organization of the Flavour Industry# Titanium Dioxide Manufacturers Association# Monsanto# Grace GmbH# EUROSIL a.i.s.b.l
